code: @Test public void testCamelPgEvent() throws Exception {     // install the camel blueprint xml file we use in this test     URL url = ObjectHelper.loadResourceAsURL("org/apache/camel/itest/CamelPgEventTest.xml", CamelPgEventTest.class.getClassLoader()).     installBlueprintAsBundle("CamelPgEventTest", url, true).     installCamelFeature("camel-pgevent").     // lookup Camel from OSGi     CamelContext camel = getOsgiService(bundleContext, CamelContext.class).     // test camel     MockEndpoint mock = camel.getEndpoint("mock:result", MockEndpoint.class).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(5000). }
